Text: The Swedish subs are hard-coded, FYI.
Title says it all, don't you think?
umm, actually it doesn't say whether the subs are hard-coded or not. See, xASPiREx, some of us don't enjoy reading mongloid while watching a film. Thank you onegreatguy for clearing it for us.

So 'SWESUB' doesn't say anything to you? Really? If you've been hanging around TPB for a while you should have noticed that everything with SWESUB on it are swedish subtitles burned in the actual movie file ..
